channel.title: Database structure help. urgent
channel.description:
ok. my teacher told us to make up a new database with 4 tables. i can do this, but i just dont have an idea to make a database for... last database i made was for some rsps type deal and we arent allowed to use DBs we've already made. i was wondering if someone could give me an idea what to design the DB after, or if they could just give me a DB they have made(no records just the tables, and fields) u would be a lifesaver.
thx, need some answer within the hour.

item.title: Database structure help. urgent
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

thx. ik how to create one. like im needing a structure. like table: player(username, password, hp, etc); bank(username, item, amount); etc. i am thinking im just going to use the DB i already created.

Read full topic

item.title: Database structure help. urgent
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

CREATE DATABASE `test`
CREATE TABLE `details` (`id` int, `name` varchar(32), `age` tinyint)
CREATE TABLE `addresses` (`id` int, `number` int, `street` varchar(32), `county` varchar(32))

etc

Read full topic

item.title: Database structure help. urgent
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

i have to create the database in both mysql and in SQL server 2008.

its just for a lab i dont think we are going to do anything with it. its just to make sure we know how to create a DB in both programs. like i said i know what to do i just dont have and idea what to design it after. im not too good at thinking on stuff like that i was thinking about doing it about minecraft.

Read full topic
